00106                 int betaOrder = 1;

00127         //Lateral Controllers
00128         double BMcLAttitudeController::aileronControl() {
00129                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00130                 double errYaw = refCommands.euler.z - euler.z;
00131                 if (errYaw>M_PI) {errYaw-=2*M_PI;}
00132                 if (errYaw<-M_PI) {errYaw+=2*M_PI;}
00133                 double targetRoll = yaw2Roll->step(errYaw);
00134                 return roll2Aileron->step( targetRoll - euler.x);
00135         }
00136 
00137         double BMcLAttitudeController::rudderControl() {
00138                 return beta2Rudder->step( -airdata.z);
00139         }
00140 
00142         //Longitudinal Controllers
00143         double BMcLAttitudeController::elevatorControl() {
00144                 double static altDesPrev;
00145                 double errAlt = refCommands.altitude - states.geoid.altitude;
00146                 double errVa = refCommands.airspeed - airdata.x;
00147 
00148                 double errPitch;
00149                 double refPitch;
00150                 int static state = 0;
00151                 double static sumErrAlt = 0, sumErrVa = 0, sumErrAlt2 = 0, sumErrVa2 = 0;
00152                 double errContr, contrOutput;
00153                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00154 
00155 
00156                 if (abs(errAlt) <= altThresh) { // within altitude hold zone
00157                         double refAlt = pitchSmoother->step(refCommands.altitude);
00158                         errAlt = refAlt - states.geoid.altitude;
00159                         if (state) {
00160                                 state = 0;
00161                                 sumErrAlt = 0;
00162                                 sumErrAlt2 = 0;
00163 
00164                         }
00165                         refPitch = alt2Pitch->step(errAlt, false, 0);
00166                         errContr = errPitch - airspd2Pitch->step(errVa);
00167                         sumErrVa += errContr*0.01;
00168                         sumErrVa2 += sumErrVa*0.01;
00169                         airspd2Pitch->Iterm += (10*errContr + 10*sumErrVa + 10*sumErrVa2)*0.01;
00170                 }
00171                 else { // outside of altitude hold zone
00172                         if (!state) {
00173                                 state = 1;
00174                                 sumErrVa = 0;
00175                                 sumErrVa2 = 0;
00176                                 pitchSmoother->init(refCommands.altitude, refCommands.altitude);
00177                         }
00178                         refPitch = airspd2Pitch->step(errVa);
00179                         contrOutput = alt2Pitch->step(errAlt, true, refPitch);
00180 
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 errPitch = refPitch - euler.y;
00184                 // std::cout << "P /  I /  D / Iterm /  Out / Target :" << alt2Pitch->P << "/"<< alt2Pitch->I << "/"<< alt2Pitch->D << "/"<< alt2Pitch->Iterm << "/"<< contrOutput << "/" << refCommands.altitude;
00185                 // std::cout << std::endl;
00186 
00187                 // smooth out commanded pitch
00188 
00189                 return pitch2Elevator->step(errPitch);
00190                 // return pitch2Elevator->step(pitchSmoother->step(errPitch));
00191         }
00192 
00193         double BMcLAttitudeController::throttleControl() {
00194                 double errAlt = refCommands.altitude - states.geoid.altitude;
00195                 int static state = 0;
00196                 double static deltat;
00197 
00198                 if (abs(errAlt) <= altThresh) {
00199                         double errVa = refCommands.airspeed - airdata.x;
00200                         if (state != 0) {
00201                                 state = 0;
00202                         }
00203                         deltat = airspd2Throt->step( errVa);
00204                 }
00205                 else if (errAlt < altThresh) {
00206                         if (state!=1) {
00207                                 state = 1;
00208                                 airspd2Throt->Iterm = deltat / airspd2Throt->I;
00209                         }
00210                         deltat = 0.0;
00211                 }
00212                 else {
00213                         if (state!=2) {
00214                                 state = 2;
00215                                 airspd2Throt->Iterm = deltat / airspd2Throt->I;
00216                         }
00217                         deltat = 1.0;
00218                 }
00219                 return deltat;
00220         }

00224         // Main Step
00225         void BMcLAttitudeController::step()
00226         {
00227                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00228                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 temp;
00229                 temp.x = states.velocity.linear.x - environment.wind.x;
00230                 temp.y = states.velocity.linear.y - environment.wind.y;
00231                 temp.z = states.velocity.linear.z - environment.wind.z;
00232                 airdata = getAirData(temp);
00233                 double output[4];
00234                 output[0] = aileronControl();
00235                 output[1] = elevatorControl();
00236                 output[2] = throttleControl();
00237                 output[3] = rudderControl();
00238                 writePWM(output);
00239         }

00245         void BMcLAttitudeController::getStates(last_letter_msgs::SimStates inpStates)
00246         {
00247                 states = inpStates;
00248         }
00249 
00251         //convert uS PPM values to control surface inputs
00252         void BMcLAttitudeController::getInput(last_letter_msgs::SimPWM inputMsg)
00253         {
00254                 //Convert PPM to -1/1 ranges (0/1 for throttle)
00255                 input[0] = (double)(inputMsg.value[0]-1500)/500;
00256                 input[1] = (double)(inputMsg.value[1]-1500)/500;
00257                 input[2] = (double)(inputMsg.value[2]-1000)/1000;
00258                 input[3] = (double)(inputMsg.value[3]-1500)/500;
00259                 input[9] = (double)(inputMsg.value[9]-1000)/1000;
00260         }
00261 
00262         void BMcLAttitudeController::writePWM(double *output)
00263         {
00264                 last_letter_msgs::SimPWM channels;
00265                 channels.value[0] = (unsigned int)(output[0]*500+ 1500);
00266                 channels.value[1] = (unsigned int)(output[1]*500+ 1500);
00267                 channels.value[2] = (unsigned int)((output[2])*500+ 1500);
00268                 channels.value[3] = (unsigned int)(output[3]*500+ 1500);
00269                 channels.value[9] = (unsigned int)(input[9]*1000 + 1000);
00270                 channels.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00271                 pubCtrl.publish(channels);
00272         }

00278                 environment = envUpdate;

00289 //Main function
00291 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00292 {
00293 
00294         ros::init(argc, argv, "controlNode");
00295         ros::NodeHandle n;
00296 
00297         ros::Duration(3).sleep(); //wait for other nodes to get raised
00298         double ctrlRate;
00299         ros::param::get("ctrlRate",ctrlRate); //frame rate in Hz
00300         ros::Rate spinner(ctrlRate);
00301 
00302         BMcLAttitudeController attCtrl(n);
00303         spinner.sleep();
00304         ROS_INFO("controlNode up");
00305 
00306         while (ros::ok())
00307         {
00308                 ros::spinOnce();
00309                 attCtrl.step();
00310                 spinner.sleep();
00311 
00312 //              if (isnan(uav.states.velocity.linear.x))
00313 //              {
00314 //                      ROS_FATAL("State NAN!");
00315 //                      break;
00316 //              }
00317         }
00318 
00319         return 0;
00320 
00321 }
